snippet: Tenants gain more privacy and the amenities a larger building can provide. Landlords can attract larger tenants, who might sign longer leases and expand in the building.
abstract: Office buildings with a building-within-a-building feature give tenants all the benefits of leasing or owning, but possibly at a lower price; landlords can attract larger tenants, who might sign longer leases and eventually expand in the building; companies like WeWork are using the strategy as an alternative for expansion in Manhattan.
lead_paragraph: Tenants gain more privacy and the amenities a larger building can provide. Landlords can attract larger tenants, who might sign longer leases and expand in the building.

headline.seo: ‘Buildings in Buildings’ Offer Benefits for Tenants and Landlords
headline.main: ‘Buildings in Buildings’ Benefit Renter and Landlord
headline.print_headline: ‘Buildings in Buildings’ Benefit Renter and Landlord
